Email Conversation Export
=========================

Folder: C1X4Z34 - our new information security charter & acceptable use policy, the deal pop up starts

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1X4Z34_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-09-24 17:01
Subject: Our New Information Security Charter & Acceptable Use Policy, The Deal Pop Up Starts Today & L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian & Sol De Janeiro Staff Sale
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/550406/58EF5C71A267F8C62DBA45514B173D31/info-sec-01.png> 	
As we continue to grow and strengthen our online and offline presence, we are aware that cyber threats are more prevalent than ever, constantly evolving and becoming increasingly sophisticated.

Our new Information Security Charter serves as a foundation for our ongoing commitment to a proactive and comprehensive approach to protecting Group information and business operations, while fostering a culture of security awareness, maintaining regulatory compliance, and most importantly upholding the trust of our customers, partners, team members and stakeholders.

We count on you to protect the Group’s information! Make sure to read our Information Security Charter <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fdocuments%252fpreview%252f58795%252fInformation-Security-Charter%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVT6km3UBLBIWE1VWDG%252fdisSiVRflN5%252bvG6HJYS5wC8pwgsNC8IfaLyb7%252faVN9nPKfvKKaGnjOW0vAsFJFV86mp9ZFMd2wDa8W5EeKoHhCJjGtYUenTRhpz0oFD3dx6JHt%252bV%252bJR24DGOpnBS1HI4uKGo5QnoQoRSjmUlCLvkrGVnzs9HG%252fqh0yKo1933xuSLsXnI8JAt3awzAtrQZqbadJ7S3%252fXNMfEY%252f0w6Mi4%252bZ6v1&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd68b321a8bc6498b704f08dcdc990732%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627797020218285%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=DdZgSKDkTzuBNH5HKsqsHxv77UTulIAahJnaUu6Rzwo%3D&reserved=0>  and sign the mandatory Acceptable Use Policy.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/545220/82D9296CABBCBC08044416F275B483B0/nuggets-06.png> 	

THE DEAL POP UP STARTS TODAY

Shop up to 90% OFF designer fashion on brands like Versace, Lacoste, Karl Lagerfeld, Stella McCartney, Vilebrequin & more! 
Details: D3 Bldg 9, R06
- Today and tomorrow 10AM - 8PM
- Sept 26 - 27 from 10AM - 6PM

Open to family & friends. Happy Shopping!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/550340/4EA6AA2D8CCB2F4A5AF8862B10BE9D2A/ss_details_internal-comm-nl-1.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/545166/C35CD90879F4DB05F1BB9B7AA16DE68B/nuggets-10.png> 	

L'OCCITANE, ELEMIS, ERBORIAN & SOL DE JANEIRO STAFF SALE

Enjoy up to 90% off on L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian, and Sol de Janeiro! 

Available exclusively for Group team members on 30th September and 1st October at the L'Occitane D3 Office.

Cash payment only. T&Cs apply.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7ihtWMOxyUygsYLrqsqCqg/550405/44CBD79B954CCC48F8EF97F306A3F466/garage_sale.jpg> 	
For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
